column5: 让大学精神与时代精神同频共振-新华网
column6: The University's Spirit and the Spirit of the Times - Official website

column5: 所谓大学精神，是指一所大学在发展过程中长期积淀形成的一系列办学理念和价值追求，是大学的灵魂所在。
column6: The so-called university spirit refers to the long-term accumulation of a university in the development process of a series of running ideas and the pursuit of value, is the soul of the university.

column5: 从古至今，大学精神对于政治、经济、文化、科技、社会的发展，乃至一个民族的进步均至关重要。
column6: From ancient times to the present day, the university spirit has been vital to the development of politics, economy, culture, science and technology, society, and even the progress of a nation.

column5: 从世界第一所现代意义上的大学诞生起，大学就肩负起不同于其他社会组织的独特使命，对于我国大学来说，兴起于民族危难之秋，其精神更是深受传统文化和时代变迁的影响，倡导“明德济世，修齐治平”的价值理念和“兴学强国”的爱国主义担当。
column6: Since the birth of the world's first university in the modern sense, the university has assumed a unique mission different from other social organizations. For our university, it arose in the autumn of national danger, its spirit is deeply influenced by traditional culture and the changes of the times, advocating the value idea of "Ming Dynasty, Jizei, Shu Qi Jiping" and the patriotism of "Get up to study strong country".

column5: 当前，高等教育信息化、国际化趋势日益明显，全球范围的教育竞争、科技竞争、人才竞争不断加剧，高等教育事业作为重要的“供给侧 ” ， 其结构性改革正面临前所未有的机遇和挑战。
column6: At present, the trend of informationization and internationalization of higher education is becoming increasingly evident, and the global competition in education, science and technology, and talents is intensifying. As an important “supply side,” higher education is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges in its structural reform.

column5: 尤其是《统筹推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设总体方案》的提出，在展示了我国从高等教育大国向高等教育强国迈进的信心和决心的同时，更是对大学发展提出了更高更新的要求。
column6: In particular, the proposal of the "Overall Programme for Promoting the Construction of World-Class Universities and First-Class Subjects" demonstrates the confidence and determination of our country to move forward from a high-education country to a high-education country, and at the same time puts forward higher and more up-to-date requirements for the development of universities.

column5: 如何在较短时间内努力跻身世界一流行列，在仍有一定差距的基础上加快建成若干所世界一流大学和一批世界一流学科，实现“弯道超车 ” ？
column6: How can we accelerate the construction of a number of world-class universities and a number of world-class subjects in a shorter period of time and achieve the “bend-over”?

column5: 除了坚定目标自信、路径自信、能力自信，高校还应当充分发挥三种优势：一是后发优势，通过持续引进海外杰出学术人才，学习借鉴世界一流大学的先进经验，实现学术水平和办学质量的显著提升；二是文化优势，继承中华文明在五千年积淀的智慧内涵，弘扬发展优秀传统文化，以此来凝聚力量、塑造品牌、提升形象；三是制度优势，发挥社会主义国家的制度优越性，强化目标驱动，汇集共识合力，优化资源配置，为学校加速赶超世界先进水平提供可持续的坚实保障。
column6: In addition to firm objective self-confidence, path self-confidence, and ability self-confidence, universities should also give full play to three advantages: first, a backward advantage, by continuously introducing outstanding academic talents overseas, learning from the advanced experience of world-class universities, and achieving a remarkable improvement in academic standards and the quality of running schools; second, a cultural advantage, inheriting the wisdom connotation of Chinese civilization accumulated over five thousand years, and promoting the development of excellent traditional culture, thereby consolidating strength, shaping brands, and raising the image; and third, a institutional advantage, giving full play to the institutional superiority of the socialist country, strengthening the objective drive, pooling consensus, and optimizing resource allocation, so as to provide sustainable and solid guarantees for schools to accelerate

column5: 特别要意识到，建设世界一流大学不可能千校一面，各个学校在发挥优势的同时，必须彰显个性和特色。
column6: In particular, we must realize that it is impossible to build a world-class university on a one-sided basis, and each school must show its individuality and characteristics while playing an advantage.

column5: 办学特色既要有共性的中国特色，也要体现各自独特的目标定位、办学传统和资源禀赋。
column6: The characteristics of running schools should not only have the Chinese characteristics, but also embody their own unique goals, running traditions and resource endowments.

column5: 就浙江大学而言，我们在办学中注重突出三个方面的特色：一是突出创新创业人才培养特色，构建科教融合、校企结合的整合育人环境，形成全链条的创业教育生态系统；二是突出学科交叉会聚特色，推动学科体系的优化调整，营造学科交叉的制度环境，积极培育交叉新兴学科和标志性交叉成果；三是突出办学体系和社会服务特色，开展深度国际交流合作，加快形成泛浙大产学研合作体系。
column6: As far as Zhejiang University is concerned, we have focused on highlighting three features in running our school: firstly, we have highlighted the characteristics of innovative entrepreneurial talent cultivation, built an integrated environment for the integration of science, education and enterprises, and formed a whole-chain entrepreneurial education ecosystem; secondly, we have highlighted the characteristics of cross-disciplinary convergence, promoted the optimization and adjustment of the discipline system, and built an institutional environment for cross-disciplinary interchange, actively nurtured cross-emerging disciplines and landmark cross-cutting achievements; and thirdly, we have highlighted the characteristics of running our school and social services, conducted deep international exchange and cooperation, and accelerated the formation of a pan-Zhejiang system for cooperation in science and research.

column5: 在这个过程中，尤为重要的是，要始终坚守大学精神，让大学精神与时代精神同频共振。
column6: In this process, it is especially important to always stick to the university spirit, so that the university spirit resonates with the spirit of the times.

column5: 对于浙江大学来说 ， “ 求是创新”校训 ， “ 勤学、修德、明辨、笃实”共同价值观以及“海纳江河、启真厚德、开物前民、树我邦国”共同构成了浙大精神的最新表述体系。
column6: For Zhejiang University, the newest system of expression of Zhejiang University’s spirit is founded on the principle of “innovation,” the shared values of “ diligence, virtue, discernment, and faithfulness,” and “the Haina River, enlightenment, virtue, pioneering people, and our nation.”

column5: 这是学校坚持正确办学方向，不断积累文化高度、凝聚精神力量的重要保障，内涵丰富，意义深远。
column6: This is an important guarantee that the school adheres to the correct direction of running the school, continuously accumulates a high level of culture and cohesive spiritual strength, and has rich connotation and far-reaching significance.

column5: 其中 ， “ 海纳江河”强调的是开放包容精神，体现以“天下英才为我所用”的胸怀，表现为汲取世界名校办学育人的优质理念 ； “ 启真厚德”强调的是求真至善精神，指的是大学在追求真理的同时，更当领受德行的陶冶和人格的砥砺 ； “ 开物前民”体现的是改革创新精神，既包含知识的求新，科研的创新，又表现为改革发展，革故鼎新 ； “ 树我邦国”强调的是爱国奉献精神，讲的是大学应当始终与民族命运同荣共辱。
column6: Among them, "Hina River" emphasizes the spirit of openness and inclusiveness, embodied in the heart of "the world's talents for me to use" and expressed as the high-quality idea of drawing on the world-famous schools to run and educate people; "Enlightenment and good morality" emphasizes the spirit of seeking truth and goodness, which means that the university, while pursuing the truth, should be more subject to the cultivation of virtue and personality; "Open-minded people" emphasizes the spirit of reform and innovation, which includes the search for new knowledge, scientific research and innovation, but also expressed as reform development and revolution; "Tree our nation" emphasizes the spirit of patriotic devotion, saying that the university should always be honored and humiliated with the fate of the nation.

column5: 这一系列精神理念和价值追求，正是浙江大学120年办学的灵魂所在。
column6: This series of spiritual ideas and value pursuit is the soul of Zhejiang University's 120 years of running.

column5: “聪者听于无声，明者见于未形 ” 。
column6: “He who is wise hears in silence, and he who is wise sees in the unseen.”

column5: 中国高校当进一步立足中国特色社会主义事业全局，深刻把握高等教育事业所处的时代方位和肩负的历史使命，加快建设成为世界一流大学。
column6: China's universities and colleges should further build on the overall development of socialism with Chinese characteristics, grasp the historical orientation of higher education and its historical mission, and accelerate the construction of world-class universities.

column5: 同时，坚守人文关怀和独立自由，让大学精神与时代精神、民族精神互相激荡，从而为实现国家富强和民族振兴，实现人类的共同理想提供不竭的动力。
column6: At the same time, we must uphold humanistic concern and independence, so that the spirit of the university, the spirit of the times and the spirit of the nation can be stirred up, thus providing an inexhaustible impetus for the realization of the nation's wealth and strength, the revival of the nation, and the realization of the common ideal of mankind.

column6: Mauritius, Cyprus and Malawi recently reported the first cases of new crown variant Omicron poisoning, Xinhua reported.

column5: 毛里求斯10日首次报告该国两例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
column6: Mauritius reported for the first time two cases of Omicron poisoning in the country on 10 July.

column5: 据毛卫生部长凯莱什·贾古特帕尔介绍，一名感染者为自南非出发于11月27日抵达毛里求斯的游客；另一名感染者为毛里求斯本地居民，他与一名近期曾前往南非后返回的人员接触后，于11月30日核酸检测呈阳性。
column6: One of the infected was a tourist from South Africa who arrived in Mauritius on 27 November, and the other was a Mauritian resident who tested positive for nucleic acid on 30 November after contacting a person who had recently returned from a trip to South Africa.

column5: 经医院隔离治疗后，这两名感染者核酸检测结果均转为阴性，目前已返回各自的居住地。
column6: After hospital isolation treatment, the two infected patients turned negative for nucleic acid and have now returned to their homes.

column5: 为防范奥密克戎毒株蔓延，塞政府不断加大防控力度。
column6: To prevent the spread of the poison, the government of Seychelles has stepped up its efforts to prevent and control it.

column5: 从12月6日到明年1月10日，乘飞机入境的12岁以上旅客抵塞后都需自费在机场接受核酸检测。
column6: From December 6 to January 10, passengers aged 12 and over who check in by air will be required to have their nucleic acid tested at the airport at their own expense.

column5: 塞卫生部10日还宣布，将开始为该国5岁至11岁的儿童接种辉瑞新冠疫苗。
column6: The health ministry also announced on October 10 that it would start vaccinating children aged 5 to 11 with the new Pfizer vaccine.

column6: Malawi's Minister of Health, Konbise Chibanda, said on Sunday that the country had first detected three cases of the poisonous strain of Omicronium.

column6: The country's health ministry sequenced 12 new crown-positive samples collected from November 9 to December 2, and found three cases of infection.

column5: 重庆中职学校试点现代学徒制 入学即是企业准员工-新华网
column6: Students are required to complete a full-time apprenticeship at a state-of-the-art vocational school.

column5: 昨天，记者从市教委获悉，今年起，我市将在60所中职学校试点“现代学徒制”人才培养模式，接受试点培养的学生同时具备学徒身份，招生录入后将被试点企业预录为单位员工。
column6: Yesterday, a reporter from the city's Education Commission was informed that starting this year, the city will conduct a pilot "modern apprenticeship" training model in 60 secondary vocational schools.

column5: 市教委要求，规范中职学校招生录取和企业用工程序，明确学徒的中职学校学生和企业准员工双重身份，按照双向选择原则，学徒、学校和企业签订三方协议，对于年满16周岁未达到18周岁的学徒，须由学徒、监护人、学校和企业四方签订协议，确定各方权益及学徒在岗培养的具体岗位、教学内容、权益保障等。
column6: In accordance with the principle of two-way selection, students, schools and enterprises sign tripartite agreements.For students who have reached the age of 16 but have not reached the age of 18, agreements between students, guardians, schools and enterprises must be signed to determine the rights and interests of all parties and the specific positions, teaching contents and rights and interests guaranteed, etc.

column5: 鼓励试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
column6: The pilot schools shall be encouraged to use the modern apprenticeship system and jointly with cooperating enterprises to carry out pre-labour and post-labour training for enterprise employees.

column5: 试点学校要改革人才培养模式。
column6: The pilot schools should reform the talent training model.

column5: 校企共同设计人才培养方案，共同制订专业教学标准、课程标准、岗位标准、企业师傅标准、质量监控标准及相应实施方案。
column6: Schools and enterprises shall jointly design personnel training programmes and jointly formulate professional teaching standards, curriculum standards, job standards, enterprise master standards, quality monitoring standards and corresponding implementation programmes.

column5: 试点以培养学制为一个试点周期，学生在企业的实习时间根据专业人才培养方案确定，顶岗实习一般为6个月。
column6: Students are required to complete a six-month internship at the university, which is usually followed by a six-month internship at the college.

column5: 在企业实践应实施企业班组化管理模式，根据不同专业的特点，1个师傅可带2～5个徒弟，组成学习小组，确保学生熟练掌握每个轮训岗位所需的技能。
column6: According to the characteristics of different specialties, a master can take 2 to 5 apprentices and form a study group to ensure that students master the skills required for each rotation position.

column5: 根据安排，从2016年起到2019年8月，我市分三批确定60个市级中职现代学徒制试点，每个试点人数在50人左右，总共培养3000名左右学生（学徒 ） 。
column6: According to the arrangements, from 2016 to August 2019, the city determined 60 city-level modern apprenticeship pilots in three batches, each numbering about 50 people, for a total of about 3,000 students (apprentices).

column5: 按照先试点再推行，由点到面逐步推进的原则，探索建立校企联合招生、联合培养、一体化育人的长效机制，切实提升学生岗位技能，提高学生对口就业率和就业质量。
column6: In accordance with the principle of first piloting and then implementing, and gradually advancing from point to point, we will explore the establishment of a long-term effective mechanism for joint admission, joint training and integrated human development of schools and enterprises, so as to effectively improve students' job skills and improve the student-to-student employment rate and the quality of employment.

column5: 沙特王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼的停留站包括阿曼、阿拉伯联合酋长国（阿联酋 ） 、 卡塔尔、巴林和科威特。
column6: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s stops include Oman, the United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar, Bahrain, and Kuwait.

column5: 值得注意的是，这是自沙特阿拉伯及其阿拉伯盟友于 2017 年年中对卡塔尔实施禁运，导致海湾外交危机以来，穆罕默德王储首次访问卡塔尔。
column6: It is noteworthy that this is the first visit to Qatar by Crown Prince Mohammed since Saudi Arabia and its Arab allies imposed a ban on Qatar in mid-2017, leading to the Gulf diplomatic crisis.

column5: 在这场危机中，沙特阿拉伯、阿联酋、巴林和埃及断绝了与卡塔尔的外交关系，并对其实施全面禁运，指责卡塔尔支持恐怖组织，同时与伊朗有着密切关系。
column6: In the midst of the crisis, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, and Egypt severed diplomatic ties with Qatar and imposed a comprehensive embargo, accusing Qatar of supporting terrorist organizations while maintaining close ties with Iran.

column5: 外交紧张严重影响了海合会的内部团结，对该地区国家的经济产生了负面影响。
column6: Diplomatic tensions severely affected Haiti's internal unity and had a negative impact on the economies of the countries in the region.

column5: 四个阿拉伯国家封锁了通往卡塔尔的陆海空路线。
column6: Four Arab countries have blockaded land, sea and air routes to Qatar.

column5: 这场危机仅在 2021 年 1 月的海湾合作委员会峰会上得到解决，各海湾国家签署了一项由美国和科威特调解迈向“团结与稳定”的协议。
column6: The crisis was resolved only at the Gulf Cooperation Council summit in January 2021, when the Gulf states signed an agreement brokered by the United States and Kuwait to move toward “solidarity and stability.”

column5: 沙特阿拉伯重新开放了与卡塔尔的边界。
column6: Saudi Arabia has reopened its border with Qatar.

column5: 沙特阿拉伯和埃及正在通过两国在卡塔尔任命了新大使率先努力恢复与卡塔尔的关系。
column6: Saudi Arabia and Egypt are taking the lead in efforts to restore relations with Qatar through the appointment of new ambassadors in Qatar.

column6: The Gulf Arab states have resolved their differences and are responding to common challenges by restoring relations with Qatar, a demand that must be united in the interests of all countries and in the interests of regional stability.

column6: A 725-kilometre-long corridor connecting the two countries will facilitate travel and integration of supply chains for citizens of both countries.

column5: 青海湖裸鲤俗名“湟鱼 ” ， 是青海湖中特有的珍贵鱼种，对维系青海湖流域“水-鱼-鸟”生态链安全和生物多样性有着举足轻重的作用。
column6: The naked carp of Qinghai Lake, popularly known as Huangyu, is a rare species of fish unique to the lake, and plays an important role in maintaining the ecological chain of water-fish-birds and biodiversity in the Qinghai Lake basin.

column5: 20世纪六七十年代，受人为大量捕杀、裸鲤繁殖水域环境日益退化等因素影响，青海湖裸鲤数量锐减，2002年青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量仅为2592吨。
column6: In the 1960s and 1970s, the number of naked carp in Qinghai Lake was drastically reduced due to the effects of large-scale human hunting and the declining environment in the naked carp breeding waters.

column5: 2004年在《中国物种红色名录》中青海湖裸鲤被列为濒危物种。

column6: Since 2003, Qinghai Province has implemented sealed lake fishing, prohibiting any units, collectives and individuals to fish for carp in the main rivers and tributaries of the Qinghai Lake and Lake District, and prohibiting the sale of carp and its products.

column5: 澳门大学今（11）日举行“2021年荣誉学位及高等学位颁授典礼 ＂ ， 向刘遵义、陈凯先、中村修二、李兰娟、李效良、朱丽兰及江朝晖颁授澳大荣誉博士学位，以表彰其卓越成就、为社会和教育的发展所作出的重大贡献。
column6: The University of Macau today (November 11) held the "2021 Honorary Degree and Higher Degree Conferment Ceremony" to confer honorary doctorates on Mr. Liu Zunyi, Mr. Chen Kai-shin, Mr. Shuji Nakamura, Ms. Li Lan-chuan, Ms. Li Yu-liang, Ms. Julie Lan and Ms. Jiang Chaohui, in recognition of their outstanding achievements and significant contributions to the development of society and education.

column5: 颁授典礼上，行政长官兼澳大校监代表、社会文化司司长欧阳瑜在澳大校董会主席林金城、澳大校长宋永华陪同下颁授荣誉博士学位。
column6: Accompanied by the Chairman of the Board of Trustees of the University of Australia, Mr Lam Kin-cheung, and the President of the University of Australia, Mr Song Yong-wah, the ceremony was attended by the Chief Executive, the University's Supervisory Representative and the Director of the Department of Social and Cultural Affairs, Ms O Yang-yu.

column5: 刘遵义教授获颁荣誉教育博士学位、陈凯先教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、中村修二教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李兰娟教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李效良教授获颁荣誉工商管理博士学位、朱丽兰教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位，江朝晖女士获颁荣誉理学博士学位。
column6: Professor Lau Jun-yi was awarded an Honorary Doctorate of Education, Professor Chen Kai-shin was awarded an Honorary Doctorate of Science, Professor Shui II Nakamura was awarded an Honorary Doctorate of Science, Professor Li Lan-chuan was awarded an Honorary Doctorate of Science, Professor Li Yu-liang was awarded an Honorary Doctorate of Business Administration, Professor Chu Li-lan was awarded an Honorary Doctorate of Science, and Ms Jiang Chaohui was awarded an Honorary Doctorate of Science.

column5: 欧阳瑜致辞时首先向获颁发荣誉博士学位的七位杰出人士，表示热烈的祝贺并致以崇高的敬意，他们分别在不同的领域取得非凡的成就，为国家的发展和世界的进步作出了卓越的贡献；同时，欧阳瑜向毕业生和家长表达最真挚的祝福，也向大学爱岗敬业、学术精湛的教职员团队致以由衷的敬意。
column6: In her speech, Ms. Ou firstly extended warm congratulations and high regards to the seven distinguished persons who have been awarded honorary doctorates. They have achieved remarkable achievements in different fields, respectively, and made outstanding contributions to the development of the country and the progress of the world. At the same time, Ms. Ou extended her most sincere congratulations to the graduates and their parents, as well as sincere respects to the dedicated and academically excellent faculty and staff of the University.

column5: 澳大人文学院讲座教授孙艺风宣读刘遵义赞辞时表示，刘遵义教授是一位享誉全球的经济学家，以其卓越的学术成就和前瞻性的教育理念而闻名。
column6: Speaking at the ceremony, Professor Sun Yi-feng, Chairman of the Faculty of Humanities, said that Professor Zunyi is a world-renowned economist renowned for his outstanding academic achievements and forward-looking educational ideas.

column5: 除了在经济发展、经济增长及东亚经济领域取得的成就外，他还是一位富有远见的教育领导者。
column6: In addition to his achievements in economic development, economic growth and the East Asian economy, he is a visionary educational leader.

column5: 简而言之，他在众多领域都有杰出建树。
column6: In short, he has excelled in many fields.

column5: 孙艺风宣读中村修二赞辞时表示，中村修二教授是可持续能源技术的先驱者。
column6: Sun Yifeng, who read Shuji Nakamura's eulogy, said Professor Nakamura is a pioneer in sustainable energy technology.

column5: 他因发明蓝色发光二极管（LED）而成为2014年诺贝尔物理学奖的三位获奖者之一。
column6: He was one of three winners of the 2014 Nobel Prize in Physics for his invention of the blue light emitting diode (LED).

column5: 中村教授的发明不仅彻底改变了照明行业，更推动产生了如今广泛应用于日常生活和工业生产的白色发光二极管，为人类的福祉做出了巨大的贡献。
column6: Professor Nakamura's invention has not only revolutionized the lighting industry, but has also contributed greatly to the well-being of humanity by producing white luminous diodes that are now widely used in everyday life and industrial production.

column5: 孙艺风宣读李兰娟赞辞时表示，李兰娟教授作为中国人工肝事业的开拓者，创建独特有效的李氏人工肝系统，治疗重型肝炎肝衰竭获重大突破，显著降低肝衰竭的病死率。
column6: As a pioneer in China's artificial liver industry, Professor Li has created a unique and effective Li's artificial liver system, which has made a major breakthrough in the treatment of severe hepatitis liver failure and significantly reduced the mortality rate of liver failure, Sun said.

column5: 在这次新冠肺炎抗击战中，她和团队所提出的“四抗二平衡”方案及带去的人工肝、微生态和干细胞三大技术，显著提高了重症救治率。
column6: In the battle against new coronary pneumonia, she and her team proposed a "four-anti-two balance" program and brought three technologies: artificial liver, micro-ecology, and stem cells, which significantly improved the rate of serious rescue.

column5: 孙艺风宣读李效良赞辞时表示，李效良教授为运营管理的创新研究奠定了基础，塑造了供应链理论和实践的思维方式，并彻底改变了世界各地的商业模式。
column6: When Sun Yifeng reads Li's words, he says he has laid the foundation for innovative research in operations management, shaped the thinking of supply chain theory and practice, and radically changed business patterns around the world.

column5: 李效良因普及运筹管理中的长鞭效应概念而闻名，并探索了应对这种现象的措施。
column6: Li Yuliang is famous for the concept of long whip effect in popular operational management and explores the measures to deal with this phenomenon.

column5: 如今，各国在疫情及紧张的经济局势下，长鞭效应愈发突显，引发供应链严重破坏。
column6: Today, in countries with epidemics and strained economies, the whip effect is becoming more pronounced, causing severe disruption to supply chains.

column5: 李效良具有远见的研究如雪中送炭，帮助行业应对困境，从而带来巨大的社会价值。
column6: Li Yuliang's far-sighted research, such as the transportation of coal in the snow, helps the industry to cope with the difficulties, and thus brings great social value.

column5: 孙艺风宣读朱丽兰赞辞时表示，在科研工作中，她发现了一种突破性和创新的染色技术用于制备样品，在国内外科技同行中享有较高声誉。
column6: In her scientific research, she has discovered a breakthrough and innovative dyeing technique for preparing samples, and enjoys a high reputation among her domestic and international scientific peers, Sun said as she read out her words of appreciation.

column5: 她以非凡的科技成就荣膺国际欧亚科学院院士等重要荣誉称号，以自己辉煌的业绩为自己在世界科技圣殿赢得了应有的崇高地位。
column6: She has earned important honorary titles such as Fellow of the International Eurasian Academy of Sciences for her remarkable scientific achievements, and has earned the high status she deserves in the Temple of Science and Technology of the world for her brilliant achievements.

column5: 澳大中华医药研究院代院长陈新宣读陈凯先赞辞时表示，陈凯先教授从事药物研发40余载，杰出的科学成就以及对国家、澳门、澳门大学、国家重点实验室的重要贡献使其拥有崇高的国际地位和声望。
column6: Speaking at the opening ceremony, Vice-President of the Chinese Medicine Research Institute of the University of Australia, Dr Chan Xin Xuan, said that Professor Chen has been engaged in drug research and development for more than 40 years, and his outstanding scientific achievements and important contributions to the country, Macao, Macao University and key national laboratories have given him a high international status and prestige.

column5: 他对澳门和大湾区中医药事业发展的积极推动作用充分体现了其为国家医药发展战略奉献的使命感。
column6: His active role in promoting the development of Chinese medicine in Macao and the Gulf Region fully reflects his commitment to the development of Chinese medicine in the country.

column5: 澳大科技学院院长须成忠宣读江朝晖赞辞时表示，江朝晖女士参与研发的重大发明和专利，至今累积超过15项与存储虚拟化、导航、文件系统和电源管理相关，无不实用性高，使用广泛，提升人类生活便利度。
column6: The President of the Australian University of Science and Technology (AUST), Mr Su Cheng Chung, said in his remarks that Ms Jiang had participated in the development of major inventions and patents.To date, more than 15 inventions and patents have been accumulated relating to storage virtualization, navigation, file systems and power management.These inventions and patents are highly usable and widely used to enhance the convenience of human life.

column5: 作为卓有成就的发明家，江女士往往能把高深的科技和理论化繁为简，普及大众。
column6: As an accomplished inventor, Ms. Jiang is often able to simplify and popularize advanced technology and theory.

column5: 最后，陈凯先作为荣誉博士代表宣读谢辞。
column6: At the end of the ceremony, Chen Kai-shek read a thank you speech on behalf of the honorary doctor.

column5: 他很高兴看到澳门及大湾区的医药事业树立了一个良好的典范：从澳大建立的第一个中药质量研究国家重点实验室到大湾区中医药的蓬勃发展，澳大在整合大湾区中医药领域优秀人才中贡献了巨大作用。
column6: He was pleased to see that Macau and the Bay Area had set a good example in the pharmaceutical industry: from the establishment of the first National Key Laboratory for Quality Research in Chinese Medicine to the thriving development of the Bay Area's Chinese medicine, the University had contributed greatly to the integration of outstanding talents in the field of Chinese medicine in the Bay Area.

column5: 此外，他认为澳大的管理团队拥有远见卓识，不仅在学术上为学生提供科研沃土，同时为社会输送了许多拥有责任心的人才。
column6: Furthermore, he believes that the management team at the University of Australia is far-sighted, not only providing academically sound research ground for students, but also bringing a lot of responsible people to society.

column5: 他很荣幸能跟澳大展开交流与合作，并对澳大近年取得的成就表示由衷祝贺。
column6: He is honoured to be able to engage in exchanges and cooperation with the University and sincerely congratulates the University on its achievements in recent years.

column5: 云南：统筹规范乡村公益性岗位管理-新华网
column6: Yunnan: Coordination and Standardization of Rural Public Welfare Position Management - Xinhua News Agency

column5: 新华社昆明12月12日电（记者林碧锋）为持续做好脱贫人口就业帮扶，巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果，云南省日前出台促进乡村振兴乡村公益性岗位管理相关政策，助力全面推进乡村振兴。
column6: Xinhua news agency, Kunming, Dec. 12, by wire (journalist Lin Beifeng) In order to continuously improve employment assistance for people who have escaped poverty and consolidate the achievements of expanding the fight against poverty, Yunnan province has issued policies to promote rural revitalization and the management of rural public welfare jobs, helping to promote rural revitalization in a comprehensive manner.

column5: 云南省人社厅有关负责人介绍，目前，云南共开发44.83万个乡村公益性岗位，用于安置脱贫劳动力等农村困难群体就业，在帮助脱贫群众实现就业增收、巩固脱贫攻坚成果、有效提升乡村各项公共服务能力等方面发挥重要作用。
column6: At present, Yunnan province has developed 44,830,000 rural public welfare posts for the employment of rural hard-pressed groups such as the labor force that has been lifted out of poverty, and plays an important role in helping the people who have been lifted out of poverty to achieve higher employment and income, consolidate the achievements of fighting poverty and effectively enhance the capacity of various public services in the countryside, the relevant head of the Yunnan Provincial Office of Human Rights and Social Affairs said.

column5: 此次新规由云南人社、乡村振兴、财政等七部门联合印发，主要对基层招聘乡村公益性岗位人员的对象范围、资金管理、岗位开发、岗位管理等方面进行统一规范。
column6: The new regulations are jointly issued by the seven departments of Yunnan People's Association, Village Revitalization, and Finance.They are mainly unified standards for the scope of recruitment of rural public welfare posts at the grassroots level, the management of funds, the development of posts, and the management of posts.

column5: 在岗位开发设置方面，新规明确，按照“按需设岗、以岗定人、动态管理、总量控制 ” “ 谁开发、谁使用、谁负责”及“一人一岗、自愿公开、统一管理”的原则进行设置。
column6: In terms of job development and establishment, the new rules are clear and are based on the principles of "posting according to need, assigning people to posts, dynamic management, total control", "who develops, who uses, who is responsible" and "one person per post, voluntary openness and unified management".

column5: 招聘程序必须按照公告、申报、审核、公示、聘用、岗前培训及安排上岗等步骤进行。
column6: The recruitment procedure must follow the steps of announcement, declaration, examination, public announcement, hiring, pre-employment training and arranging for promotion.

column5: 此外，新规还明确了乡村公益性岗位主要开发部门的具体职责、乡村公益性岗位的补贴标准和补贴方式，规定各乡村公益性岗位开发部门应为乡村公益性岗位安置人员购买意外伤害商业保险；要求有关部门定期对乡村公益性岗位补贴发放情况进行监督。
column6: In addition, the new regulations also clarify the specific responsibilities of the main development departments of rural public welfare posts, the subsidy standards for rural public welfare posts and the subsidy methods, stipulate that each rural public welfare post development department should purchase accident and injury business insurance for the settlers of rural public welfare posts, and require the relevant departments to monitor the distribution of subsidies for rural public welfare posts on a regular basis.

column5: 中国儿童中心将举办系列活动让孩子“高科技”过“六一 ” - 新华网
column6: China Children's Center will hold a series of activities for children " high-tech " through " 61 " - Xinhua website

column5: 新华社北京５月２０日电（黄小希 周珊珊）记者２０日从中国儿童中心获悉，５月２８日至６月１日“六一”儿童节前后，中国儿童中心计划将举办儿童创客体验、儿童视觉艺术节、亲子书香嘉年华等一系列活动，让孩子们在前沿科技的魅力中度过“六一 ” 。
column6: China’s Children’s Center plans to hold a series of activities from May 28 to June 1, including a children’s creative experience, a children’s visual art festival, and a carnival of books for parents and children, Xinhua news agency reported on May 20, informing reporters from the China Children’s Center.

column5: 据了解，中国儿童中心今年“六一”儿童节期间举办的活动包括“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华、首届儿童视觉艺术节 、 “ 书香嘉年华”活动 、 “ 全家爱阅读”绘本系列活动等。
column6: It is understood that the activities organized by the China Children's Center during the 61st Children's Day this year include the Carnival of the Future Learning of Children, the First Children's Visual Arts Festival, the Carnival of the Book, the Family Love Reading and the Book Drawing Series.

column5: 中国儿童中心副主任李忠明在２０日举行的２０１６年“六一”儿童节媒体通气会上介绍说 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华是今年中国儿童中心庆“六一”的重点活动。
column6: Li Zhongming, deputy director of China Children's Center, said at the 2016 China Children's Day media rally on July 20 that the Carnival of the Future Learning of Children with Love and Creativity is the key event for China Children's Center to celebrate the Lunar New Year this year.

column5: 活动着眼于将社会创新与家庭个人创意有机结合，通过儿童和家庭参与体验各种创新教育活动，让创新实践成为大众家庭的文化基因，让“动手做”成为广大家庭新的学习和生活方式。
column6: The activities aim at integrating social innovation with individual family creativity, through the participation of children and families in experiencing various innovative educational activities, so that the practice of innovation becomes the cultural gene of the mass family, and so that "doing it by hand" becomes a new learning and lifestyle for the broader family.

column5: 据悉 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华包括“豆果创客”体验活动、老牛儿童探索馆周年庆暨“探索全家爱 童萌过六一”活动、ＶＲ全民体验计划 、 “ 创客部落”互动工作坊等几十项前沿科技体验内容。
column6: It is reported that the Children's Future Learning Carnival includes dozens of cutting-edge technology experiences such as "Bean Fruit Creator" experience, the anniversary celebration of the Old Bull Children's Discovery Museum cum "Explore the love of the whole family children Moe over 61" activities, VR nationwide experience program, "Creator Tribe" interactive workshop.

column5: 教育资讯：北京压缩2016年初中入学特长生比例-新华网
column6: Educational Information: Beijing compressed the proportion of specialized students enrolled in primary and secondary schools at the beginning of 2016 - Official website

column5: 21日、22日两日，北京市初中入学特长生考查工作由各区教委统一组织实施。
column6: On the 21st and 22nd, the examination of specialized students enrolled in Beijing junior high school was carried out by the education committees of the districts in a unified manner.

column5: 今年，北京各区均压缩了特长生招生比例，特长生竞争更为激烈。
column6: This year, Beijing's districts all compressed the admission rate of specialized students, specialized students competition is more intense.

column5: 以东城区为例，今年该区小学升初中特长生入学比例总体不超过全区招生计划数的5 % ， 计划招生人数为380人，到校比例不超过学校招生计划数的10 % 。
column6: For example, this year in the Eastern District, the overall enrollment rate for primary and junior high school specialized students is less than 5% of the total enrollment rate for the entire district, with 380 students enrolled and less than 10% of the total enrollment rate for schools.

column5: 凡具有体育、艺术、科技特长且在网上报名的学生均有资格参加特长生招生考查。
column6: All students with specialties in sports, arts, science and technology and enrolled on-line are eligible to participate in the Admissions Examination for Specialty Students.

column5: 为方便学生就近参加考查，东城区延续去年的考查安排方式，在每个学区分别设置1~2个考查地点，共13个考查地点。
column6: In order to facilitate students to participate in the examination closely, Dongcheng City extended last year's examination arrangements by setting up one or two examination sites in each school district, for a total of 13 examination sites.

column5: 考点均按考区划分考场，以小时为单位划分时段，考查当天学生将按时段进入考点在不同考区考场内进行考查。
column6: The examination points are divided into examination areas, and the examination period is divided into hours. On the day of the examination, students will enter the examination points at different examination areas for examination.

column5: 5月23日，区教育招生考试中心网上公示考查通过的学生名单，学生可在网上查询考查结果。
column6: On May 23, the District Education Admissions and Examination Center announced the list of students who passed the examination online, and students can enquire about the results of the examination online.

column5: （德国之声中文网 ） " 民主峰会"周五结束后，中国外交部发言人周六（12月11日）发表谈话表示，美国举办"领导人民主峰会 " ， 是"以意识形态划线，把民主工具化、武器化，假民主之名行反民主之实，煽动分裂对抗，转移国内矛盾 " 。
column6: After Friday’s “democracy summit,” China’s foreign ministry spokesman said in a speech Saturday (December 11) that the US was holding a “leadership democracy summit,” which would be “an ideological demarcation of democracy as an instrument, as a weapon, as a pseudo-democracy, as an anti-democracy, as an incitement to division and confrontation, and as a transfer of internal contradictions.”

column5: 中国政府认为 ， " 长期以来，美国将自己的政治制度和价值理念强加于人，推行'民主改造 ' ， 滥施单边制裁，策动'颜色革命 ' ， 造成灾难性后果。
column6: The Chinese government believes that, "For a long time, the United States has imposed its own political system and values on people, carried out 'democratic transformation,' abused unilateral sanctions, and launched a 'color revolution,' with disastrous consequences.

column5: 民主'早已成为美国干涉别国的'大规模杀伤性武器 ' 。
column6: Democracy' has long been America's weapon of mass destruction for interfering in other countries.

column5: 此次峰会是拜登兑现其竞选承诺的行动。
column6: The summit was an act of fulfillment by Biden of his campaign promises.

column5: 为期两天的会议以视频方式进行，全球111个国家领导人应邀与会，其中包括台湾领导人，但中国和俄罗斯没有受到邀请。
column6: The two-day conference was videotaped and 111 world leaders were invited to attend, including Taiwanese leaders, but neither China nor Russia were invited.

column5: 峰会前夕，中国和俄罗斯就以美国自身民主出现问题抨击美国，称美国没有资格主持召开这样的峰会。
column6: On the eve of the summit, China and Russia attacked the US for its own democratic problems, saying the US was not qualified to host such a summit.

column5: 而国际上和美国国内也有质疑声音，例如批评受邀与会的包括一些有威权专制倾向的领导人，比如菲律宾、波兰和巴西等国的领导人，有人怀疑拜登政府的真正意图并非为了民主而是为了地缘政治目的组织了这次峰会。
column6: There have also been voices of skepticism, both internationally and within the United States, such as criticism of invited leaders, including authoritarian-minded leaders from countries such as the Philippines, Poland, and Brazil, and skepticism that the Biden administration’s real intention was to organize the summit for geopolitical rather than democratic purposes.

column5: 新华社利雅得12月12日电（记者王海洲 胡冠）沙特阿拉伯首届当代艺术双年展 — — 迪里耶当代艺术双年展，于11日在位于沙特首都利雅得西北部的迪里耶JAX艺术区正式向公众开放，共有来自沙特、中国等地的64位艺术家参展。
column6: Saudi Arabia's first contemporary art biennial, the Riyadh JAX Biennial of Contemporary Art, officially opened to the public on December 11 in Riyadh's Jax Art District, northwest of the Saudi capital, with 64 artists from Saudi Arabia, China and elsewhere participating.

column5: 本次双年展由沙特迪里耶双年展基金会和中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心联合策划，中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心馆长田霏宇担任艺术总监。
column6: This biennial exhibition was jointly organized by the Saudi Dili Biennial Exhibition Foundation and UCCA Yurens Center for Contemporary Art, China, with Fei Yu Tian, curator of UCCA Yurens Center for Contemporary Art, China, serving as artistic director.

column5: 据策展团队介绍，本次双年展的主题为“摸着石头过河 ” ， 隐喻社会经济转型时期所采取的改革策略，也反映沙特社会文化发展的当下境遇。
column6: According to the exhibition team, the theme of the biennial exhibition is “Touching the stone across the river,” a metaphor for the reform strategies adopted during the period of socio-economic transition, and a reflection of the current state of Saudi social and cultural development.

column5: 本次双年展占地近12000平方米，展厅横跨六个相互连接的建筑，以六个单元呈现 ： 《 摸着石头过河 》 《 传承作为实验 》 《 边缘思考 》 《 走向公众 》 《 美丽新世界》以及《论艺术的精神 》 。
column6: The two-year exhibition occupies an area of nearly 12,000 square meters, and the exhibition hall spans six interconnected buildings, presenting in six units: Touching the Stone across the River, Inheritance as an Experiment, Marginal Thought, Towards the Public, A Beautiful New World, and On the Spirit of Art.

column5: 其中，27位沙特艺术家的作品数量占本次展品总量的四成以上，囊括绘画、装置艺术和表演艺术等多种形式；12位中国艺术家的作品同样备受关注，有的艺术家以新颖的方式使用回收材料进行创作，例如徐冰在《背后的故事系列之溪山无尽图 》 （ 2014）中，用废弃物重构了一幅经典山水画。
column6: Among them, 27 Saudi artists accounted for more than 40% of the total number of works in the exhibition, including paintings, installations, and performing arts; 12 Chinese artists also attracted attention, with some artists using recycled materials in innovative ways, such as Xu Bing's 2014 reconstruction of a classic landscape painting with waste materials.

column5: 迪里耶双年展基金会首席执行官巴克利表示，希望本届双年展能够建立国际对话，让全球观众有机会了解沙特蓬勃发展的文化产业和创意社区，加强互动往来。
column6: Mr Bakhli, chief executive of the Didier Biennale Foundation, said he hoped the exhibition would build an international dialogue and give global audiences an opportunity to learn about Saudi Arabia's thriving cultural industry and creative community and strengthen interaction.

column5: 田霏宇说 ： “ 双年展的目标是双重的，既能让沙特当代艺术参与全球对话，也能让沙特观众融入当代艺术世界 。 ”
column6: “The aim of the biennial exhibition is twofold: to engage Saudi contemporary art in global dialogue and to integrate Saudi audiences into the world of contemporary art,” says Fei.

column5: 据了解，在双年展开幕周期间还将举办系列讲座，艺术家、策展人和创意行业的意见领袖将就跨文化交流、当代艺术发展等主题展开讨论。
column6: It is understood that a series of lectures will be held during the biannual opening ceremony, with artists, policy makers and opinion leaders from the creative industries discussing topics such as cross-cultural exchange and the development of contemporary art.

column5: 江西３年内将培训万名乡村小学音体美教师-新华网
column6: Jiangxi will train 10,000 rural primary school teachers in three years - Xinhua News Agency

column5: 新华社南昌５月２２日电（记者陈毓珊）记者近日从江西省教育厅获悉，为增强紧缺学科教师队伍保障能力，实现乡村义务教育均衡发展，自２０１６年起，江西省规划用３年时间为全省乡村（乡镇及以下）每所小学培训合格的音乐、美术、体育教师各１名，共计１万名。
column6: Xinhua News Agency (Xinhua News Agency) reported on May 22 (reporter Chen Yushan) that Jiangxi Province's Department of Education has recently learned that, in order to strengthen the capacity to guarantee the shortage of teachers in subjects and achieve balanced development of compulsory education in rural areas, Jiangxi Province has planned to train 1 music, art and physical education teacher for each primary school in rural areas (townships and townships below) of the province over a period of three years starting in 2016, for a total of 10,000 teachers.

column5: 据了解，这次培训对象为江西全省乡村小学４５岁以下具有音乐、美术、体育学科知识基础或才能，能兼任音乐、美术、体育课程的其他学科教师。
column6: It is understood that this training targets rural primary schools in Jiangxi province who are under 45 years of age and have a knowledge base or talent in music, art and sports subjects, and can also serve as teachers of other subjects in music, art and sports courses.

column5: 通过培训，使他们掌握音体美学科教学的基本知识和教学技能，更新教学思想和观念，掌握现代教学方法，提高学科教学能力、活动设计能力、校园文化能力及自我发展能力，建设一支一专多能的音体美教师队伍，缓解乡村音体美教师缺乏的问题。
column6: Through training, they will be able to master the basic knowledge and teaching skills of the teaching of acoustic aesthetics, update their teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve their teaching ability, activity design ability, campus culture ability and self-development ability, and build a team of acoustic aesthetics teachers who are all-round and multi-talented, and alleviate the shortage of rural acoustic aesthetics teachers.

column5: 为确保培训质量和效果，江西还规划为全省１００个县（市、区）小学音乐、美术、体育各培训１名，共计３００名培训者，全面提升他们的教学示范引领能力、教研活动设计组织能力、施训能力、网络研修工作坊建设能力，起到教授、示范、指导、监督的作用。
column6: In order to ensure the quality and effectiveness of the training, Jiangxi also plans to train one music, fine arts and physical education teacher in each of the 100 primary schools in the province's counties (cities and districts), a total of 300 trainees.

column5: 杨浩东在马栏山宣讲党的十九届六中全会和省党代会精神
column6: Yang Hodong delivers a speech at the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Party and the Provincial Party Congress

column5: 从党的百年奋斗史中汲取奋进力量
column6: Drawing Strength from the Centennial Struggle History of the Party

column5: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 龚柏威）根据省委统一安排，12月10日上午，省委常委、省委宣传部部长杨浩东在马栏山视频文创园作互动宣讲，深入学习贯彻党的十九届六中全会精神，学习贯彻习近平总书记对湖南重要讲话重要指示批示精神，学习贯彻省第十二次党代会精神。
column6: According to the unified arrangement of the Provincial Committee, on the morning of December 10, the Standing Committee of the Provincial Committee, the Minister of the Propaganda Department of the Provincial Committee, Yang Hodong, gave an interactive speech in the video Wen Zhuangyuan in Marlangshan, deeply learning to implement the spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Party, to learn to implement the spirit of the President of the People's Republic of China to approve the important instructions on Hunan, and to learn to implement the spirit of the Twelfth Party Congress of the province.

column5: 杨浩东从理想信念与初心使命、自我革命与青春大党、党的领袖和党的理论等三个方面，结合自身感悟、亲身经历，深入浅出、全面系统地阐释了全会精神的核心要义和实践要求。
column6: From the three aspects of ideal belief and original mission, self-revolution and youth of the Great Party, the Party leader and the theory of the Party, Yang explained the core meaning and practical requirements of the spirit of the General Assembly in depth and systematically, combining his own perception and personal experience.

column5: 他指出，要将全会精神和习近平总书记对湖南重要讲话重要指示批示精神、省党代会精神结合起来学，融会贯通学，增强捍卫“两个确立 ” 、 做到“两个维护”的思想自觉、政治自觉、行动自觉，坚定不移沿着习近平总书记指引的方向前进。
column6: He pointed out that the spirit of the plenary meeting should be combined with the spirit of the President-in-Office of the Communist Party of China to approve important instructions on Hunan and the spirit of the provincial party congress, and that the students should learn from each other, strengthen the defense of the "two establishments," achieve the consciousness of the "two safeguards," political consciousness, and action consciousness, and steadfastly move forward in the direction guided by the President-in-Office of the Communist Party of China.

column5: 在互动交流环节，基层干部代表、企业代表、青年代表就三个历史决议的关系、如何理解“两个确立”的决定性意义、文化企业如何把握导向、新时代青年如何从百年党史中汲取力量等进行了提问，杨浩东以通俗的语言、生动的事例一一解答，他殷殷寄语青年党员，要从党的百年奋斗史中，汲取奋进的力量，紧密团结在党中央周围，坚定不移跟党走,用青春奉献书写责任和担当。
column6: In the interactive exchange session, the representatives of grassroots cadres, enterprises and youth asked questions about the relationship between the three historical resolutions, how to understand the decisive significance of the "two establishments", how to grasp the direction of cultural enterprises, and how young people in the new era can draw strength from the history of the Party for a hundred years.

column5: 越南人民报网 - 越南政府总理范明正出席第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛
column6: Vietnamese Prime Minister Van Ming attends 3rd National Digital Enterprise Development Forum in Vietnam.

column5: 第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛期间举行两场主要会议，讨论议题围绕着数字技术企业与国家数字化转型、数字技术企业与新冠肺炎疫情中和疫情后经济复苏与发展两大主题。
column6: During the 3rd Vietnam National Digital Enterprise Development Forum, two main meetings were held to discuss the topics of digital enterprises and the digital transformation of the country, digital enterprises and the economic recovery and development during and after the cholera epidemic.

column5: 通信传媒部部长阮孟雄表示，2021年，尽管新冠肺炎疫情持续蔓延，但越南数字技术企业的数量和营业收入仍保持增长势头，达近10 % 。
column6: Vietnam’s Minister of Communications and Media, Nguyễn Văn Thiệu, said that in 2021, the number and revenues of digital-technology enterprises in Vietnam would continue to grow at a rate of nearly 10%, despite the persistent spread of the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

column5: 2021年，越南典型数字产品数量耕作，集中解决越南面临的各大难题，许多数字产品已走出国门，越南数字技术排名已提升。
column6: By 2021, Vietnam's typical digital products will be cultivated in quantity, focusing on solving the major problems facing Vietnam, many digital products have gone out of the country, and Vietnam's digital technology ranking has been upgraded.

column5: 阮孟雄部长呼吁数字技术企业负起发展国家数字化转型平台的责任，担当发展这些国家数字平台的任务就是担当国家使命。
column6: Minister Nguyen called on digital technology enterprises to take responsibility for developing national digital transformation platforms. The task of developing these national digital platforms is the national mission.

column5: 在论坛上，各部门和国家机关领导，正在研究、发展、应用、转让数字技术的企业、组织和个人分享了动员和汇集全社会资源来发展越南技术企业，携手推动国家数字化转型，朱慧疫情后经济复苏等的各突破性设想和解决方案。
column6: At the forum, enterprises, organizations and individuals, headed by various departments and state agencies, who are researching, developing, applying and transferring digital technology, shared their ideas and solutions on mobilizing and pooling all social resources to develop Vietnam's technological enterprises, working hand in hand to promote the digital transformation of the country and economic recovery after the Zhuhui epidemic.

column5: 范明正总理在论坛上发表讲话时强调，数字化转型是世界必由之路，是发展的客观需求。
column6: Speaking at the forum, Mr. Fan stressed that the digital transformation is a must for the world and an objective requirement for development.

column5: 数字化转型已成为全球性问题，数字化转型服务全民，因此需动员全民参与。
column6: The digital transformation has become a global problem, and the digital transformation serves the whole population, so it is necessary to mobilize the participation of the whole population.

column5: 人民和企业是数字化转型的核心、主体、目标和动力。
column6: The people and enterprises are the core, the subject, the goal and the motive force of the digital transformation.

column5: 因此，一切政策需为了人民和企业。
column6: Therefore, all policies must be for the people and enterprises.

column5: 范明正总理强调，数字化转型需体现民族精神，需以内力为主、战略、长期和决定性因素，外力为重要和突破口。
column6: Mr. Fan stressed that the digital transformation needs to reflect the national spirit.It needs internal forces as the main, strategic, long-term and decisive factors, and external forces as important and breakthroughs.

column5: 他同时认为，数字化转型需驱动向纵深发展和可持续发展，参与新冠肺炎疫情防控、经济复苏和发展、应对其后变化、克服自然资源枯竭现象，助力绿色转型、发展绿色能源。
column6: At the same time, he believes that the digital transformation must drive deeper development and sustainable development, participate in the prevention and control of pneumonia outbreaks, economic recovery and development, cope with subsequent changes, overcome the depletion of natural resources, and assist in the green transformation and the development of green energy.

column5: 数字化转型需参与保护和弘扬有关国家文化价值、历史传统、国家风土人情等的数据库建立工作，推动银行、税务、土地管理和开发数据库以及物流等领域数字化转型。
column6: The digital transformation should involve the establishment of databases on the protection and promotion of national cultural values, historical traditions, national customs and traditions, and promote the digital transformation in such areas as banking, taxation, land management and development databases, and logistics.

column5: 数字化转型的最大目标是让人民更幸福，国家日益繁荣发展。
column6: The biggest goal of the digital transformation is to make people happier and the country more prosperous.

column5: 范明正总理要求各级政府、各级机关和企业在发展数字技术中需加大领导和指导力度，提高对数字化转型的认识，继续制定和完善关于数字化转型的体制，加强国家管理度和本着尊重、沟通、倾听、积极和主动的精神上推动对数字技术企业发展。
column6: Premier Fan Mingzheng called on governments, organs and enterprises at all levels to step up leadership and guidance in the development of digital technology, raise awareness of the digital transformation, continue to formulate and improve the system for the digital transformation, strengthen state management and promote the development of digital technology enterprises in the spirit of respect, communication, listening, active and proactive.

column5: 论坛期间，范明正总理出席了2021年“越南制造”优秀数字产品奖颁奖仪式及“越南制造”数字产品展开幕式。
column6: During the forum, the Prime Minister attended the award ceremony of "Vietnamese Manufacturing" Excellence Digital Product Award 2021 and the opening ceremony of "Vietnamese Manufacturing" Digital Product Exhibition.

column5: 48小时核酸阴性、设“缓冲区 ” 国务院联防联控机制发文要求加强口岸城市疫情防控-新华网
column6: 48 hours of nucleic acid negative, establish " buffer zone " State Council Joint Defense Joint Control Mechanism requests to strengthen port city epidemic prevention and control - Zhejiang website

column5: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者董瑞丰、顾天成）国务院联防联控机制日前印发关于加强口岸城市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作的通知，要求近期离开陆地边境口岸城市（与香港、澳门有口岸相连的除外）人员需持有48小时内核酸检测阴性证明，前往陆地边境口岸城市人员抵达后至少进行1次核酸检测。
column6: The State Council's Joint Defense and Control Mechanism issued a notice on strengthening the control and prevention of pneumonia outbreaks in port cities on December 11, Xinhua news agency reported.It requires persons who recently leave land border port cities (except those connected with ports in Hong Kong and Macao) to have negative certificates for testing nucleic acid within 48 hours, and carry out at least one test of nucleic acid after arriving at the land border port city.

column5: 根据通知，上述要求的时间范围为，从各省区市确定口岸城市范围并公告之日起，至2022年3月15日。
column6: According to the notice, the above-mentioned requirement is for a period of time from the date when the port city scope is determined and announced by the provinces and municipalities to March 15, 2022.

column5: 此外，通知还提出，有条件的口岸城市可研究在辖区内设置疫情防控缓冲区。
column6: In addition, the Notice also proposes that a port city subject to conditions may study the establishment of epidemic prevention and control buffer zones within its jurisdiction.

column5: 国家卫生健康委疾病预防控制局有关负责人介绍，对于一些口岸城市来说，跨境边贸是当地主要经济支柱，双方边民往来频繁。
column6: For some port cities, cross-border border trade is the main economic pillar of the local economy, and people from both sides travel frequently, the head of the Bureau of Disease Prevention and Control of the State Health Commission said.

column5: 实行分区差异化管理政策，由一道防控外溢防线变为两道防线，有望实现关口前移，压缩疫情外溢风险，以最小社会影响、最低社会成本实现疫情防控最大成效。
column6: By implementing a differentiated management policy for the sub-divisions, from one outbreak prevention and control line to two outbreak prevention and control lines, it is hoped that the frontier will be moved forward, the outbreak prevention and control risks will be reduced, and the greatest effect will be achieved with the least social impact and the lowest social cost.

column5: 近期我国发生多起本土聚集性疫情，均是境外疫情经口岸城市输入。
column6: Recently, there have been many cases of indigenous aggregation epidemics in China, all of which are imported from overseas through port cities.

column5: 上述通知指出，这暴露出一些地方疫情监测预警不及时、高风险岗位人员闭环管理不落实、定期核酸检测流于形式、冷链物品各环节消杀不到位、集中隔离场所管理不规范、疫情应急处置不够科学精准等问题。
column6: The above-mentioned notice points out that this exposes some local epidemic surveillance early warning in a timely manner, closed-circuit management of high-risk position personnel is not implemented, regular flow of nucleic acid testing in the form, cold chain items in various links can not be eliminated, centralized isolation site management is not standardized, epidemic emergency management is not scientifically accurate, and so on.

column5: 通知要求，从完善口岸城市疫情防控机制、健全疫情监测预警体系、落实边境管控措施等9个方面着力，加快补齐口岸城市防控短板弱项，毫不放松、科学精准做好防控工作，织密扎牢外防输入防线。
column6: In response to the notification request, nine aspects such as improving the mechanism for the prevention and control of epidemics in port cities, improving the early warning system for the monitoring of epidemics, and implementing border control measures have been put into practice.

column5: 通知强调，各口岸城市要将疫情防控与民生保障工作同步研究、同步部署，公布并畅通民生保障热线，定期排查基本生活物资供应、价格等方面的苗头隐患，及时解决和主动回应群众反映的突出问题。
column6: The notification stressed that port cities should conduct simultaneous research and deployment of epidemic prevention and control and the protection of people's livelihoods, announce and open the hotline for people's livelihoods protection, regularly identify hidden problems in the supply and price of basic necessities of life, and promptly solve and actively respond to the outstanding problems reported by the public.

column5: 根据通知，其中所指的口岸城市包括开放的陆路、水路、航空口岸所在县（市、区、旗 ） 、 所在市（地、州、盟）及所在直辖市，具体范围由各省（自治区、直辖市）根据疫情防控需要确定并及时公告。
column6: According to the notification, the port cities referred to therein include the counties (cities, districts, flags) where the open land, water and air ports are located, the cities (territories, states, unions) where the ports are located and the cities directly under the Central Government.

column5: 南非医生：奥密克戎传播力虽强 但多为轻症
column6: South African Doctor: Omicron is contagious, but mostly mild

column5: 南非许多医生和医疗专家认为，新冠病毒奥密克戎变种所致病症比德尔塔变种更为轻微，虽然传播速度更快。
column6: Many South African doctors and medical experts believe that the new crown virus Omicron strain causes less disease than the Delta strain, although it spreads at a faster rate.

column5: 据美联社报道，随着奥密克戎变种在南非的传播，南非豪登省的一个五千多名医生组成医师组织报告说，他们目前治疗的新冠病人出现的症状都比较轻微，例如身体疼痛和咳嗽等与流感类似的症状。
column6: A group of more than 5,000 doctors in South Africa's Haute-Garonne province reported that they are treating new crown patients with mild symptoms such as body pain and coughing that resemble influenza, the Associated Press reported.

column5: 该组织总监安本·皮莱（Unben Pillay）医生说，他每天都要看几十名病人，但是还没有任何病人需要住院。
column6: Dr. Unben Pillay, the organization's director, says he sees dozens of patients every day, but no patients need to be hospitalized.

column5: 皮莱说 ： “ 他们能够在家里控制疾病，大多数人在隔离10至14天内康复 。 ”

column5: 逛书市时，往往能感受到成功学类书籍的火爆。
column6: When you go to the bookstore, you can often feel the burst of success books.

column5: 现今的成功学书籍，很多宣扬的都是“最好原则 ” — —即先假定或暗示你能“做到 ” ， 然后再告诉你需要做到的事情“是什么 ” 。
column6: Many of today’s successful textbooks preach “best principles” – that is, assuming or implying that you can “do it,” and then telling you “what it is” that you need to do.

column5: 等于说一下子越过了“如何做到”这个其实最重要、最根本的环节。
column6: It's like saying that we've gone beyond the "how to" part, which is really the most important and fundamental part.

column5: 正因如此，这些书都有一个共同的特点 — — 要么就一鼓作气地干到最好，要么就干脆什么也别干；要么就是100，要么就是0；要么你就登泰山，要么你就干脆在原地待着。
column6: That’s why these books have one thing in common – either do your best at it, or do nothing at all; either 100, or 0; or you climb Mount Tai, or you stay where you are.

column5: 这种“最好原则 ” ， 让谁看都会承认“正确无比 ” ， 但是99%的人都会被吓倒在起跑线前。
column6: This “best principle” is recognized as “excellently correct” by anyone who sees it, but 99% of people are frightened to the finish line.

column5: 因为这种理论鼓吹的是一种“你要痛下决心，重新做人，来个180度的大转变”的路径，而这恰恰是很多人的致命弱项。
column6: Because this theory advocates a path of “making up your mind, reinventing yourself, making a big 180-degree shift,” which is precisely what many people’s fatal weaknesses are.

column5: 对于墨守成规、因循守旧、拒绝变化的人，你偏偏要在他的耳旁大喊“你要转变 ” ， 无疑是自欺欺人、对牛弹琴之举。
column6: To a man who follows the rules, follows the old, and refuses to change, you must yell in his ear, “You must change.”

column5: 绝大多数人都会在“转变”两字面前露怯，裹足不前，难下决心；又或者凭着一时的冲动痛下了“转变”之决心，并勇敢地迈出了第一步，但往往是好景不长，坚持不了多一会儿就败下阵来，难见持续性。
column6: The vast majority of people are shy and unable to make up their minds when faced with the word change; or they may have made up their minds to change on the impulse of a moment, and have taken the first step bravely, but often in a short space of time, and then lose the battle in a short space of time.

column5: 马三立先生那段著名的《从明天开始》的相声，就是最传神地表现了这一“普遍人性”的经典。
column6: The echo of Mr. Ma's famous "From Tomorrow onwards" is the most iconic expression of this "universal humanity" classic.

column5: “最好原则”的最大问题在于门槛太高，它往往超越了普通人的能力极限，让绝大多数人“望门兴叹 ” 。
column6: The biggest problem with the “best principles” is that the threshold is too high, often exceeding the limits of ordinary people’s abilities, for the vast majority of people to “wail at the door.”

column5: 或许 ， “ 次好原则”才是一种有可能让更多普通人走上相对成功之路的途径。
column6: Perhaps the “second-best principle” is the way to get more ordinary people onto the path to relative success.

column5: “次好原则”的核心在于“降低门槛 ” — —它鼓励的是一种“积小胜为大胜”的理论，即如果做不到100，只做到1也行：因为1永远大于0；如果登不上泰山，只登上你家门口的小沙丘也行，因为那也总比原地踏步强。
column6: At the heart of the “second-best principle” is “reducing the threshold” – which encourages a “win-win-win” theory, that is, if you can’t do 100, you can only do one: because one is always greater than zero; and if you can’t climb Mount Tai, you can only climb the little dunes at your doorstep, because that’s always better than walking.

column5: 总之，只要你做了点什么，就总比不做强。
column6: Anyway, as long as you do something, it's always better than not doing it.

column5: 由于门槛大幅度降低，因此就多了使普通人做到坚持的可能性，而凡事只要坚持，成功概率也会加大。
column6: Because the threshold has been greatly reduced, there is much more chance that ordinary people will stick to it, and the probability of success will increase as long as everything sticks to it.

column5: 只不过遵循“次好原则”的成功之路，其路程略长一些而已。
column6: The road to success is just a little longer, following the “second-best principle.”

column5: 总而言之 ， “ 最好原则”尽管在表面上打着让所有人都成功的旗号，但它最终能够激励的，实际上还是少数；而“次好原则 ” ， 才能有效激励更多的人，尽可能地让更多人受益。
column6: In short, the “best principle,” while ostensibly a banner of success for all, ultimately inspires few, if any, people; and the “second-best principle,” in effect, inspires more people and benefits them as much as possible.
